| History                 = Company founded by [[Anthony Stark (Earth-616)|Tony Stark]] after [[Stark Industries (Earth-616)|Stark Industries]] was taken over by [[Obadiah Stane (Earth-616)|Obadiah Stane]]. Because Stark was left penniless, the seed money for the company came largely from small investors in [[Imperio]] and [[Japan]].{{r|Iron Man: Legacy Vol 1 8|9}} 

Stark was forced to leave the company as part of a truce with [[Pride (Earth-616)|the Pride]].{{r|Iron Man: Legacy Vol 1 10|11}}
